data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
If i have enough time, i'm intending to - by a piece by piece -
    make a free, useful, large, practical Finnish word inflecting
    system. Finnish isn't easy language to do these things and it has
    very strange and complicated rules. That's why there's only
    expensive commercial software for this. But I think this is a good
    start.

    I chose the namespace because Jarkko (don't remember his family
    name) has made some Finnish linguistic modules being in same
    namespace Lingua::FI.
